history.proof: intros h st t c li lt st' m H. hauto use: handleRequestVote_type, handleRequestVote_log.

ctx: intros h st t c li lt st' m H.
remember (advanceCurrentTerm st t) as st'' eqn:Heq.
remember (if true then false else true) as b eqn:H3.
destruct (moreUpToDate li lt (maxTerm (log st'')) (maxIndex (log st''))) eqn:H4.
destruct (votedFor st'') eqn:H5; inversion H; subst; auto.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet *: Current bullet * is not finished.

ctx: intros h st t c li lt st' m H.
remember (advanceCurrentTerm st t) as st'' eqn:Heq.
remember (if true then false else true) as b eqn:H3.
destruct (moreUpToDate li lt (maxTerm (log st'')) (maxIndex (log st''))) eqn:H4.
destruct (votedFor st'') eqn:H5; inversion H; subst; auto.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet * is not finished.

original: intros h st t c li lt st' m H. unfold handleRequestVote in H. destruct (t <? currentTerm st) eqn:H1. - inversion H; auto. - remember (advanceCurrentTerm st t) as st'' eqn:Heq. destruct (leaderId st'') eqn:H2. + remember (if true then false else true) as b eqn:H3. destruct (moreUpToDate li lt (maxTerm (log st'')) (maxIndex (log st''))) eqn:H4. * destruct (votedFor st'') eqn:H5; inversion H; subst; auto. * inversion H; auto. + inversion H; auto.
